duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee innovation in AI applied to medical education and clinical informatics
Participate in curricula development and instruction for medical education
Advise PhD and masters students and carry out independent research
Conduct research in efficacy of AI technology in medical education and patient safety improvement
Implement precision medicine displays and develop new approaches to documentation
Collaborate on projects led by other faculty members

education_certification.credential: Medical degree and training in biomedical informatics (PhD and Masters preferred)
